titleStmt.title: A treatise of civil power in ecclesiastical causes shewing that it is not lawfull for any power on earth to compell in matters of religion / the author, J.M.
titleStmt.author: Milton, John, 1608-1674.

notesStmt.note: Address "To the Parliament of the Commonwealth of England" signed: John Milton.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
